verbs.description: [ARG0: Emmanuel Macron] [V: turns] on [ARG1: Donald Trump] [ARGM-LOC: in speech to Congress] . We must ban the French !
Emmanuel Macron turns on Donald Trump in speech to Congress . We [V: must] ban the French !
Emmanuel Macron turns on Donald Trump in speech to Congress . [ARG0: We] [ARGM-MOD: must] [V: ban] [ARG1: the French] !
